title: The Potlikker Papers: Food Meets Politics in The American South
itunes:title: The Potlikker Papers: Food Meets Politics in The American South
itunes:subtitle: The Mafia muscles in on Italian bakeries, cooking for civil rights with John T. Edge, Dan Pashman of The Sporkful on airline dining and the new fattoush. Originally aired July 13, 2017.
description:
The Mafia muscles in on Italian bakeries, cooking for civil rights with John T. Edge, Dan Pashman of The Sporkful on airline dining and the new fattoush. Originally aired July 13, 2017.
